lines.text: I dated a criminal once.
Only once?
He owned a used car lot. They busted him for turning back the odometers.
How could you trust someone like that?
I figured I did the same thing when I told him I was 21.
You are a convicted inmate on death row. What five albums would you pick?
That's it. I'm never flying this airline again!
[Teri takes the drink orders]
I'll have the complimentary champagne.
Like hell you will!
Okay, I'll have a Bloody Mary.
Weaver!
Hold the vodka, the celery and the Tabasco.
If you wanted a tomato juice, why didn't you just say so?
We need you to program the autopilot so it can vector you around the storm front ahead. You've got a level 6 storm.
Is that a 6 on a scale from 1 to 10?
No, Teri... on a scale of 1 to 6.

Wait a minute, wait a minute. You've got a 747 beat to hell by level 6 turbulence, your flight crew is dead, you've got an armed convicted serial killer loose on board, eight passengers have disappeared, and your stewardess is locked in the goddamned cockpit. Have I left anything out?
You forgot about the truck.
[it's stuck to the landing gear]
You're not going to kill me. You can't kill me, 'cause you don't believe in capital punishment.
I changed my mind!
How's a fucking stewardess going to land the plane?
She's a flight attendant!
Say your prayers.
What would you like to drink?
Heineken.

[thinks for a second and hands the underage passenger a carton of milk. He grunts]
Merry Christmas!
I know it's meaningless to mention. But a detective planted the evidence that convicted me.
You're innocent.
Yes, I am.
Duly noted.
[opens a book titled "The Inner Guide Meditation"]
Are you married?
Yeah, but I don't wear rings. I don't like jewelry.
You don't have to defend yourself to me. Was that a tough sell to your wife? The "I don't like wearing jewelry" bit?
Weaver, I know you'd like to entertain yourself by engaging me in a challenging conversation. But, I like to read on a plane.
Okay. Duly noted.
Ok, she's cleared the buildings. There's just one small problem...
I think it's a ford...
[stuck to the landing gear]
So I heard these prisoners are being transported?
Yeah. One of them is a burglar and the other is the Lonely Hearts Strangler.
male Caucasian, 35, well educated, raised by his aunt who mysteriously disappeared when he was 16, has raped and strangled five women, escaped when being transported to San Quentin.

[after Maggie is strangled to death by Ryan]
You rubbed me the wrong way.

[Ryan chasing Teri on the plane]
Dashing through the snow...
Alright, I need a volunteer for a dangerous mission.
[pulls out three circuit boards]
You, You, You,OK,You
[pulls the main circuit board and gets electrocuted]
OW! WHOA, WHOA, Ok, you can stay.
[Ryan gets his foot wedge by the smoke barrier and screams]
OH... you BITCH.
